post.body: Praying 4 u on Ur 1st day!
@realpants it was Good Bc it was prompt. A knight should be on time!
@boys jess reid took care of pants's fix. Go help Kari.
@sgagne thx 4 complimenting my chili! @sgagne i am technically not a vegetarian anymore. c'mon u saw the display @ thanksgiving
democrats r angry @ his choice Bc warren fought 2 make gay marriage illegal in cali.
Another day of Reading & comp training. Short staffed So my trainer won't Really be w me 2day. Lunch now.
Yeah my previous tweet was an equation 4 falling asleep on the couch! Transferring 2 my bed...
Watching a christmas story in my big Comfy Robe
1st day Gr8 day long day. I get hour long Lunch breaks.
Wow! Amazing nite @ repo! God was speaking right 2 students & lives were changed 4Ever!
TJ got me a big yellow smiley face ring today. he loves me. :)
Just painted my nails 4 the 1st time since my wedding! 3 & 1/2 yrs! But now i can Bc no more starbucks.
My last day @ sbux & i get sent home early. This is not what i thought it'd be like... On the upside, caricature guy drew me!
Last day @ sbux!
Got a new purse 4 5 bucks! Its the same 1 courtney got, but i couldn't pass it up. Plus, free boots! Prayer answered! Thx jesus! & ruth!
i am really loving the "four arguments u can't win" series on perrynoble.com. check it out!
I Call my creation... Mexican potato lasagna.
My Crazy casserole tastes Good!
I Made a cake in a bundt Pan... Now that Its frosted it Looks like a giant donut! Ha.
Wrapping xmas gifts 4 my fam. Sending a box home instead of Going home this year!
Making a Never-Been-Made-b4 casserole 4 dinner. Lol Let's hope It's Yum-o!
A customer just Gave me Ten bucks as a xmas gift!
Just got robbed! Every1 is Ok.
Gr8 nite @ the movies w some teens. Saw beverly hills chihuahua. Very cute.
Holy crap we almost got robbed! They left here & robbed 2 other banks!
Its 3 degrees in the D
Awesome nite @ repo! Now loving the students on the repo bus.
Obama Asked rick warren 2 do the invocation @ his inauguration.
Freak accident: our ipod fell into the heat vent behind our fridge! I know! Dude i prayed in the spirit & we recovered it w a stick Lol. ...
While playing charades, some1 acted out & shekila guessed a frozen bum! Lol.
